statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_room_availability;
SELECT room_name, occupancy_capacity FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT room_name FROM virtual_room_availability ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE occupancy_capacity >= 10;
SELECT room_name, is_available FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = false ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = TRUE
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE occupancy_capacity > 5 ORDER BY room_name DESC
SELECT room_id, room_name, occupancy_capacity FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = TRUE AND occupancy_capacity >= 10
SELECT * FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = TRUE ORDER BY occupancy_capacity ASC, room_name ASC
SELECT room_id, room_name, is_available FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE occupancy_capacity IN (5, 10)
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = TRUE
SELECT room_id, room_name, is_available FROM RoomAvailability ORDER BY room_name DESC
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-09-30'
SELECT meeting_id, room_id, meeting_date FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = TRUE
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM RoomAvailability ORDER BY room_name DESC
SELECT meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE room_id = 2 AND meeting_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT room_id, meeting_date, start_time FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE end_time < '12:00:00' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_title, start_time FROM meetings WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, location, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT meeting_title, start_time, end_time FROM meetings WHERE end_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, room_id, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT meeting_title, start_time FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, location FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 10 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT meeting_title, start_time, end_time FROM meetings JOIN reservations ON meetings.meeting_id = reservations.meeting_id;
SELECT room_name, reservation_date FROM rooms JOIN reservations ON rooms.room_id = reservations.room_id WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRoom;
SELECT room_id, room_name, capacity FROM VirtualRoom WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM VirtualRoom ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Meeting WHERE organizer = 'John Doe';
SELECT m.meeting_id, m.start_time, p.participant_name FROM Meeting m JOIN MeetingParticipant mp ON m.meeting_id = mp.meeting_id JOIN Participant p ON mp.participant_id = p.participant_id;
SELECT room_name, capacity, availability FROM VirtualRoom WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Meeting WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND organizer = 'John Doe';
SELECT participant_name, email FROM Participant WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT room_name, COUNT(meeting_id) AS meetings_count FROM VirtualRoom JOIN Meeting ON VirtualRoom.room_id = Meeting.room_id GROUP BY room_name HAVING meetings_count > 5;
SELECT room_name, availability, start_time, organizer FROM VirtualRoom JOIN Meeting ON VirtualRoom.room_id = Meeting.room_id WHERE availability = TRUE AND start_time > NOW() ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRooms;
SELECT room_name, max_occupancy FROM VirtualRooms;
SELECT room_name, max_occupancy FROM VirtualRooms WHERE max_occupancy > 10;
SELECT * FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-20';
SELECT room_id, availability_date, is_available FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT room_name, max_occupancy FROM VirtualRooms;
SELECT meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM Participants WHERE LENGTH(email) > 10;
SELECT room_id, availability_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_date, occupancy_count FROM OccupancyHistory ORDER BY occupancy_count DESC;
